name: Esala Perahera
description: A grand Buddhist procession in Kandy, featuring beautifully decorated elephants, traditional dancers, and drummers to honor the Sacred Tooth Relic.

name: Vesak and Poson Festivals
description: Marking the birth, enlightenment, and passing away of Lord Buddha. Streets and temples are adorned with colorful lanterns and lights.

name: Sinhala and Hindu New Year (Avurudu)
description: A joyous festival symbolizing the traditional New Year celebrated by Sinhalese and Tamil communities with games, food, and rituals.
